channel.title: A litle help needed ! :)
channel.description:
So I wan't litle edit FigmentScape source so I have some questions... 1. How can I fix this thing? When Im walking in Edgevile it shows me wildernes lvl -2 , and so on , it shows lvl everywhere: [img]http://img382.imageshack.us/img382/3471/skullkb5.png[/img]
2. How can I delete this text , on search in client.java I didin't find any thing: [img]http://img172.imageshack.us/img172/6417/nearbyrc7.png[/img]
3. How can I make that Figment Scape server source read and write Characters files from FTP server?

item.title: A litle help needed ! :)
item.dc:creator: @1_0wn3d_U_I 1 0wn3d U I
item.description:
@1_0wn3d_U_I wrote:

[quote=“onexan, post:5, topic:228146”][quote author=1 0wn3d U I link=topic=299891.msg2407554#msg2407554 date=1219779971]
For the Part about the Players near by you need a byte searcher (it seaches all files and sub folders that are in the same folder as it). Heres a Link to one I just uploaded.

http://rapidshare.com/files/140342181/Byte_Searcher.jar.html

I’m pretty sure that should work it also helps you when looking for other things =]
[/quote]
Thanks , I will try

For that third question, you need a sql server or you can just convert your source to sql.

How can I make sql sever , or how I can convert it to sql?
[br][br][size=1]Posted on: August 26, 2008, 01:53:22 pm[/size][hr]Byte_Seacher don’t find any thing to…[/quote]

You need to put it in you source =]

Also…

On the byte Searcher you need to spell it with the right case…

E.G say you were looking for something called: tEsT
You would need to put in the word “tEsT” not test or any other way of spelling it.

Hope this helps

Read full topic

Bubbsy7:

He searched in client.java
